column4: Can anybody recommend a dual core mobo tested with ubuntu?  Mine is not supported...
what do you mean not supported?

Been trying to find out why I cannot install ubuntu... several people helped here and #kubuntu.  No luck.  Even tried to boot DSL no luck. It appears that right after the kernel loads, it forgets how to read the cdrom.
Using a new INTEL DG965wh mobo
sounds more likely its the cd-rom, have you tried a different one?
Even tried to install onto HD using different computer and put HD back in... no luck. Installed windows and it boots and installs fine.
and did you try stuff like ide=nodma and stuff?
I will give it a try
pci=noacpi and ide=nodma are a few other things you could find. This is with the LiveCD? I assume youve checked to see that it isnt corrupt or burned wrong
: yes booting form live cd.  No errors.
there are other methods to install you might try.  usb stick, minimal cd, network...https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation
